exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params lhllsi : leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface rri : raft_refinement_interface si : sorted_interface lmi : log_matching_interface nisi : nextIndex_safety_interface Unable to unify "raft_refinement_interface" with "forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets step_async_init) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> exists (h : Net.name) (ll es' ll' : list entry), es = es' ++ ll' /\\ (forall e : entry, In e es' -> eTerm e = t) /\\ In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState step_async_init h))) /\\ Prefix ll' ll /\\ (plt = t /\\ pli > maxIndex ll \\/ (exists e : entry, In e ll /\\ eIndex e = pli /\\ eTerm e = plt /\\ Prefix_sane ll' ll pli) \\/ plt = 0 /\\ pli = 0 /\\ ll' = ll)".

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

```coq

Qed.```

forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Qed.
